LanguageData.NY_trait_BeautyPC.degreeDatas.0.label: beauty of paperart
LanguageData.NY_trait_BeautyPC.degreeDatas.0.descript: Physical beauty and ability to see through words enabled {PAWN_nameDef} to handle social tasks with ease. More over, {PAWN_pronoun} take great pride in {PAWN_possessive} body patters and longs to show them off.
LanguageData.NY_trait_EyeWJ.degreeDatas.0.label: eye of jade
LanguageData.NY_trait_EyeWJ.degreeDatas.0.description: The mind of {PAWN_nameDef} is as sharp as {PAWN_possessive} eyes, capable of seeing through enemy covers or scientific challenges.
LanguageData.NY_trait_SkinBW.degreeDatas.0.label: skin of porcelain
LanguageData.NY_trait_SkinBW.degreeDatas.0.descriptio: {PAWN_nameDef} was born with a skin that looks like porcelain, touches like one, and as fragile as one. {PAWN_pronoun} is more prone to damages.
